workspaces.description: Ubuntu is a Linux distribution based on Debian.
workspaces.name: bittles999/ubuntu_vivaldi:latest
workspaces.notes:
The Kasm Ubuntu Jammy Workspace requires libseccomp => 2.5.3 to run.

This can be checked by running runc --version

If you still want to run Ubuntu Jammy but do not have the minimum required libseccomp version, it can be run in an unsecure manner by adding: {"security_opt":["seccomp=unconfined"]} to the Docker Run Config Override (JSON) setting above.

NOTE: This will run the Workspace without the docker seccomp sandbox and will significantly reduce the amount of protection that Kasm Workspaces can provide.
